techmeme.title: ESPN launches a Where to Watch feature on its website and app, which aims to be a universal guide for streaming sports with data from 250+ streaming services (David Pierce/The Verge)
French prosecutors say Telegram CEO Pavel Durov will be brought to court for a first appearance and a possible indictment and that his police custody has ended (Associated Press)
Google rolls out Imagen 3 to all Gemini users and Gems, which allows the creation of custom Gemini chatbots, to Gemini Advanced, Business, and Enterprise users (Abner Li/9to5Google)
Google plans to roll out image generation of people to Gemini paid users soon, after suspending the feature in February amid criticism about racial depictions (Julia Love/Bloomberg)
Environmental and health advocates accuse xAI of adding to pollution in Memphis, Tennessee, by using unauthorized gas burning turbines at its new data center (Lora Kolodny/CNBC)
